reviews.review:
Best game in the world! Love the Russians, love the Scammers, love the crying kids and people who accuse you of cheating, it's just brilliant, cyka! Now go and play!

EDIT: So I never used Cheat Engine or anything close. But somehow VAC decided I can't play any mode anymore. Not even against bots. I checked for corrupted files. I reinstalled the entire game - BUT NOTHING - STILL VAC-SHIT and still not playable. Completely out of the blue. 
I've got no words for this...

EDITS EDIT: Took me decades but after learning how to do a double backflip and finding the Magic Garden of Gaben I managed to fulfill the VAC-SHITs demands and get the game running again.

I miss operations.

edit: its back. 10/10 best game
